get.description:
The objects returned from this endpoint will include an `ip_address` field if and only if the
requesting user is authorized to manage bans.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

items.description: Detailed information about a KZ player.

ip_address.description:
The player's IP address.

This field is only included if the requesting user has `BANS` permissions.

is_banned.description: Whether this player is currently banned.

post.description:
This endpoint is for CS2 servers. Whenever a player joins, they make a `GET` request to fetch
information about that player. If that request fails, they will attempt to create one with this
endpoint.

get.summary: Fetch a specific player by their name or SteamID.
get.description:
The object returned from this endpoint will include an `ip_address` field if and only if the
requesting user is authorized to manage bans.

schema.description: Different ways of identifying a player.
Detailed information about a KZ player.

ip_address.description:
The player's IP address.

This field is only included if the requesting user has `BANS` permissions.

is_banned.description: Whether this player is currently banned.

patch.description:
This endpoint is for CS2 servers. Whenever a player disconnects, or when the map changes, they
will update players using this endpoint.

get.summary: Fetch Steam profile information for a specific player.

schema.description: Different ways of identifying a player.

steam_id64.description: The user's SteamID in its stringified 64-bit format.

profile_url.description: URL to the user's Steam profile.

avatar_url.description: URL to the user's Steam avatar.

schema.description: Different ways of identifying a player.

checksum.description: CRC32 checksum of the map's `.vpk` file.

mappers.description: Players who contributed to the creation of this map.

schema.description: Response body for creating a new map.

get.summary: Fetch a specific map by its name or ID.

schema.description: Different ways of identifying a map.

checksum.description: CRC32 checksum of the map's `.vpk` file.

mappers.description: Players who contributed to the creation of this map.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description:
Filter by host.

This can either be a domain name, or an IP address.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Only include servers approved after this date.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only include servers approved before this date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

host.description:
The server's host.

This can either be a domain name, or an IP address.

schema.description: Response body for creating a new server.

get.summary: Fetch a server by its name or ID.

host.description:
The server's host.

This can either be a domain name, or an IP address.

post.summary: Generate a temporary access token using a CS2 server's API key.
post.description: This endpoint is for CS2 servers. They will generate a new access token every ~30min.

put.summary: Generate a new API key for a server, invalidating the old one.

delete.summary: Delete a server's API key, preventing them from generating new JWTs.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Only include jumpstats submitted after this date.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only include jumpstats submitted before this date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

strafes.description: How many strafes the player performed during the jump.

distance.description: The distance cleared by the jump.

sync.description: The % of airtime spent gaining speed.

max.description: The maximum speed during the jump.

height.description: The maximum height reached during the jump.

airpath.description:
How close to a perfect airpath this jump was.

The closer to 1.0 the better.

deviation.description: How far the landing position deviates from the jumpoff position.

schema.description: Response body for creating a new jumpstat.

get.summary: Fetch a specific session by its ID.

get.description:
This will redirect the user to Steam, where they can login. A session for them will be created
and they're redirected back to `redirect_to`.

parameters.name: redirect_to
parameters.description: URL to redirect the user back to after a successful login.

get.description:
This will invalidate your current session, and potentially every other session as well (if
`invalidate_all_sessions=true` is specified).

parameters.name: invalidate_all_sessions
parameters.description: Whether to invalidate all (still valid) sessions of this user.

get.summary: The endpoint hit by Steam after a successful login.
get.description: This should not be used directly, and trying to do so will lead to errors.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

get.summary: Fetch a specific admin by their SteamID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

git_revision.description: The git revision associated with this release.

post.summary: Submit a new CS2KZ plugin version.
post.description: This endpoint is intended to be used by GitHub Actions.

schema.description: Response body for submitting a new plugin version.

AccessKeyRequest.description: Request payload for generating a temporary access key.

AdminUpdate.description: Request payload for updating an admin.

permissions.description: New set of permissions for the admin.

BanUpdate.description: Request payload for updating an existing ban.

expires_on.description:
A new expiration date.

If this field is omitted, nothing will happen.
If it is explicitly set to `null`, the expiration date will be set to `NULL`
(permanent).

mappers.description: Players who contributed to the creation of this course.

CourseIdentifier.description: Different ways of identifying a map course.

CourseInfo.description: Information about a KZ map course.

CourseSession.description: Session information tied to a specific course.

started_runs.description: How many times the player has left the start zone of this course.

finished_runs.description: How many times the player has entered the end zone of this course.

CourseSessions.description: Course sessions for all the modes.

CourseUpdate.description: Request payload for updating a map course.

added_mappers.description: List of SteamIDs of players to add as mappers to this course.

removed_mappers.description: List of SteamIDs of players to remove as mappers from this course.

CreatedBan.description: Response body for submitting a new ban.

teleports.description: Whether this filter is for teleport runs.

FilterUpdate.description: Request payload for updating a course filter.

checksum.description: CRC32 checksum of the map's `.vpk` file.

mappers.description: Players who contributed to the creation of this map.

GameSession.description:
A game session.

Game sessions start when a player joins a server, and end either when the player disconnects,
or when the map changes. They record statistics about playtime, bhops, and potentially other
metrics in the future.

strafes.description: How many strafes the player performed during the jump.

distance.description: The distance cleared by the jump.

sync.description: The % of airtime spent gaining speed.

max.description: The maximum speed during the jump.

height.description: The maximum height reached during the jump.

airpath.description:
How close to a perfect airpath this jump was.

The closer to 1.0 the better.

deviation.description: How far the landing position deviates from the jumpoff position.

Limit.description: limits the amount of returned values

MapIdentifier.description: Different ways of identifying a map.

MapUpdate.description: Request payload for updating an existing map.

check_steam.description: Whether to check the Workshop for a new name / checksum.

added_mappers.description: List of SteamIDs of players to add as mappers to this map.

removed_mappers.description: List of SteamIDs of players to remove as mappers from this map.

The server's host.

Game Session information.

A game session starts when a player joins a server, and ends either when they disconnect or
when the map changes.
